title: Customer Service 101, with Andy Frisella - MFCEO10
description: Customer service is not about making a sale today.  It is about forging a relationship and building loyalty over a lifetime. From the supreme importance of solving problems and finding solutions to the proven formula of education, trust, and loyalty, Andy Frisella shares his thoughts on the essentials of customer service.
